headline: Search operation launched in Mendhar Poonch, meanwhile an encounter going on in Chatroo Kishtwar. As per sources, Trt...
text:
Search operation launched in Mendhar Poonch, meanwhile an encounter going on in Chatroo Kishtwar. 
As per sources, Trts evaded after a brief exchange of fire. One paratrooper injured, he is safe & stable.

headline: HAL Begins Production of Next-Gen Trainer Aircraft
text: Hindustan Aeronautics Limited has initiated production of the advanced trainer aircraft at its Bengaluru facility. The aircraft will replace the aging Kiran fleet and enhance pilot training capabilities.
gptExplanation: Initial report from defense sources. Verification pending official confirmation.

headline: Border Roads Organisation Completes Strategic Tunnel in Arunachal
text: BRO has successfully completed construction of a 2.5km strategic tunnel in Arunachal Pradesh, enhancing connectivity to forward areas. The tunnel will reduce travel time by 45 minutes.
gptExplanation: Multiple sources confirm completion. Awaiting official inauguration announcement.

headline: Indian Navy Deploys New Electronic Warfare Systems
text: The Indian Navy has deployed advanced electronic warfare systems on its frontline destroyers. The indigenous systems provide enhanced capabilities for signal intelligence and electronic countermeasures.
gptExplanation: High credibility sources confirm deployment. Technical details verified.

headline: New Satellite Imaging Facility Operational in Hyderabad
text: ISRO's new satellite imaging and analysis facility has become operational in Hyderabad. The facility will process data from Cartosat and other earth observation satellites.
gptExplanation: Unverified report from industry sources. Confirmation pending from ISRO.

headline: Coastal Security Exercise Conducted in Arabian Sea
text: A major coastal security exercise involving multiple agencies was conducted off the Gujarat coast. The exercise tested coordination between Navy, Coast Guard, and state police forces.
gptExplanation: Officially confirmed exercise. Multiple verified sources report the event.

headline: DRDO Tests New Anti-Drone System
text: The Defence Research and Development Organisation has successfully tested an indigenous anti-drone system capable of jamming and neutralizing hostile drones up to 5km range.
gptExplanation: Test confirmed by defense sources. Technical specifications align with expected capabilities.

headline: New Cyber Security Command Established in Delhi
text: A new integrated cyber security command has been established in New Delhi to coordinate defense against cyber threats. The command will work with multiple agencies.
